Construction

3D modeling and photogrammetry for accurate site documentation

Safety inspections and compliance monitoring

Industry-Specific Questions

Common questions about drone applications in different industries

Which industry has the highest earning potential?

Asset inspection and construction typically offer the highest hourly rates, ranging from $160-$400+ per hour for experienced pilots.

What equipment is needed for different industries?

Equipment requirements vary by industry. Construction may need mapping capabilities, while film requires high-quality cameras. We provide detailed equipment recommendations in your personalized report.
